alert.note: Alert for Craig; Delaware; Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 11 at 12:54AM CDT until April 11 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Craig County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northern Delaware County in northeastern Oklahoma... Ottawa County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1253 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Bluejacket, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Miami... Vinita... Grove... Commerce... Fairland... Afton... Quapaw... Welch... Bernice... Bluejacket... Wyandotte... Picher... Honey Creek State Park... Bernice State Park... Cleora... Narcissa... Ottawa... Peoria... Cardin... Pyramid Corners... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 282 and 324. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
